ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Construct and plot objective hierarchies and associated value and utility functions. Evaluate the values and utilities and visualize the results as colored objective hierarchies or tables. Visualize uncertainty by plotting median and quantile intervals within the nodes of objective hierarchies. Get numerical results of the evaluations in standard R data types for further processing.

Construct and plot objective hierarchies and associated value and utility functions. Evaluate the values and utilities and visualize the results as colored objective hierarchies or tables. Visualize uncertainty by plotting median and quantile intervals within the nodes of objective hierarchies. Get numerical results of the evaluations in standard R data types for further processing.

name: r-utility
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.4.7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-utility
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/utility_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/utility/utility_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3bc201101b934086d51d9fef7886d8983a19b71892cb66fc6b3bc7727faf8616

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('utility')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('utility')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=utility
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Construct and plot objective hierarchies and associated value and utility functions. Evaluate the values and utilities and visualize the results as colored objective hierarchies or tables. Visualize uncertainty by plotting median and quantile intervals within the nodes of objective hierarchies. Get numerical results
    of the evaluations in standard R data types for further processing.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - FridolinHaag

# Package: utility
# Type: Package
# Title: Construct, Evaluate and Plot Value and Utility Functions
# Version: 1.4.5
# Date: 2020-03-09
# Author: Peter Reichert <peter.reichert@eawag.ch> with contributions by Nele Schuwirth <nele.schuwirth@eawag.ch>
# Maintainer: Peter Reichert <peter.reichert@eawag.ch>
# Description: Construct and plot objective hierarchies and associated value and utility functions. Evaluate the values and utilities and visualize the results as colored objective hierarchies or tables. Visualize uncertainty by plotting median and quantile intervals within the nodes of objective hierarchies. Get numerical results of the evaluations in standard R data types for further processing.
# License: GPL-3
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-03-09 06:45:11 UTC; reichert
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-03-09 10:00:02 UTC
